name: EmyLiveShow: Hentai Puzzle Game
description:
In the game you will find over 60 erotic illustrations.



  • Emy will be presented in her standard everyday attire, a maid-catgirl costume, and latex with a cat mask.
  • Nia will be presented in her standard everyday attire, a bunny costume, and a latex costume.
  • Uma will be presented in her standard everyday attire, a casual outfit (plaid skirt and schoolgirl shirt), and pink latex with a cap.
  • Six will be in a strict classic suit (Men in Black), a swimsuit, and a latex costume.
